DOC.brief_summary: This study investigate whether automate whole breast ultrasound improve detection cancer breast cancer screen use supplement mammography supplement digital breast tomosynthesis
DOC.brief_title: Automated Breast Ultrasound Digital Breast Tomosynthesis Screening Compared Full Field Digital Mammography Women With Dense Breasts
DOC.criteria: Able willing provide sign declaration inform consent legally authorize representative provide sign declaration inform consent participation study procedure ; Women age â‰¥18 year time enrollment ; * Women previous determination dense breast determine mammogram heterogeneously dense extremely dense ; At moderately increase high risk ( > 15 % lifetime risk ) breast cancer base meet one ACS criterion 1 : AND Referred screen mammography Have screen use breast image technology < 12 month immediately prior enrollment ; Exhibit breast cancer symptom accord assessment subject 's health care provider within one year prior enrollment ; Diagnosed breast cancer , without metastasis , within one year prior enrollment ; Are currently pregnant determine per standard clinical practice investigational site ; Present contraindication image examination require study protocol ; Have breast implant ; OR Are lactate .
